basic_info.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹ I'm Pulkit Agrawal. I am a full stack developer with a passion for developing scalable web applications. I am extremely passionate about development. I like to turn ideas into code and solve real-world problems. I have an engineering degree in computer science. I love to work in a fast-paced environment. I am keenly interested in finance and startups. I am fluent in Javascript, ReactJs, and MERN stack.
basic_info.interests: Besides that, I spend my time playing cricket and binge watching Netflix. I also like to read books. I always look forward to meet and connect with new people and have a chat over a cup of coffee. You can contact me on LinkedIn, Twitter or Email.
